title: New launcher
body:
Hello i have new launcher and i cant play any mode like One for All or Asencion..
Please help me.. :)

replies.body:
Featured game modes are not available on the updated client just yet!  You can return to the legacy client in the meantime:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Hope this helps!
